user_instruction: 'Send an email to Dr. Smith (harold.smith@consultant.com) with my ideas on passenger flow improvements. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["harold.smith@consultant.com"],"subject":"Passenger Flow Improvement Ideas","body":"Dear Dr. Smith,

I hope you are doing well.

I’ve been reviewing our terminal’s current bottlenecks and wanted to share several concepts that could meaningfully improve passenger flow:

• Reconfigure the security checkpoint to add extra parallel lanes, helping disperse surges during peak periods.
• Deploy an adaptive queue-management system with real-time digital signage that directs travelers to the shortest lines.
• Integrate biometric verification at key control points to accelerate identity checks while maintaining security standards.
• Add strategically positioned support columns and way-finding elements in the main concourse to create natural lanes that guide foot traffic and reduce cross-flows.
• Explore the use of smart materials in high-traffic floor sections to improve durability and passenger comfort.

I’d value your thoughts on these ideas and would be happy to discuss them further or provide additional detail.

Best regards,

[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: Your email has been sent to Dr. Smith with the passenger-flow improvement ideas.

final_output: Your email has been sent to Dr. Smith with the passenger-flow improvement ideas.
